name: Recruiting an Informant
objective: Persuade a key individual to work for you and provide valuable intelligence.

failure.message: Your target refused your offer and reported you to the authorities. You were forced to flee, damaging your Trust Level and increasing your Exposure.

neutral.message: The informant agreed to help, but they remain skeptical and unreliable. You gained some intelligence, but their loyalty is questionable.

success.message: The informant has been fully persuaded and is eager to provide high-value intelligence. Your Trust Level has increased, and your network grows stronger.
